QuestData.Title: Corrupted Whipper Root
QuestData.CompletionText: You have found a sickly, corrupted version of what appears to be a whipper root plant. The visible roots of the plant appear tough and leathery, and a slimy film hangs from the plant. It desperately needs some sort of attention if it is to be turned back to normal.
QuestData.RewardText: You apply 3 Cenarion Plant Salves to the Whipper Root. It immediately begins to shed its corrupted form, blossoming into a vibrant and healthy plant.
